table_name	description
Variables	Lists the full descriptive information about what variables have been measured.
Methods	Lists the methods used to collect the data and any additional information about the method.
Sites	Provides information giving the spatial location at which data values have been collected.
Sources	"Lists the original sources of the data, providing information on who collected the data."
QualityControlLevels	Contains the quality control levels that are used for versioning data within the database.
Qualifiers	Contains data qualifying comments that accompany the data.
DataValues	Contains the actual data values and keys to metadata tables. 
SeriesCatalog	Summarizes the time series available in the DataValues table.
